description: Create a lineup dispatch fulfillment clerk.
permissions: User must be authorized to create the related lineup dispatch; this permission delegates to the lineup policy for the associated lineup (admin, customer manager or broker manager, or a manager laborer tied to one of the lineup job production plans).
side_effects: Creates a lineup dispatch fulfillment clerk and triggers the asynchronous fulfillment workflow by enqueuing perform_async for the lineup dispatch.
validation_notes: Lineup dispatch relationship is required. The CLI rejects empty --lineup-dispatch, and the model validates presence of lineup_dispatch before performing async fulfillment.
